summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Kordon Oasis (Novalek) Bell Bottle 8oz Review Date: 2014/05/08 Store: Kordon Product Description: ['UPC 0-48054-80408-3 Item # 80408 M-08 AC Bell Bottle 8 oz. Color Tinted Suitable for up to three rats, hamsters, gerbils, hedgehogs, sugar gliders and similar "pocket-pet" type animals. The 8 ounce Bell Bottle will serve several mice.'] Average Rating: 3.3 Product Details: {'Material': 'Polyethylene Terephthalate (PET)', 'Brand': 'Kordon', 'Item Weight': '0.14 Pounds', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '3 x 2 x 10.5 inches', 'Capacity': '8 Ounces', 'Product Dimensions': '3 x 2 x 10.5 inches; 2.24 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'K80408', 'UPC': '048054804083', 'Manufacturer': 'Kordon/Novalek/Oasis'} Review Text: I have ordered two of those 8 oz bottles, one by one. I was so happy about the perfect water flow on the first bottle that I ordered an additional one of the same brand. Both of them came in red, which I am satisfied with, however I wish there was a color choice prior to ordering, I would choose teal. I also bought a smaller, 4 oz one from Supper Pet, which constantly clog, after the first lick (do not buy it). I then ordered a 4 oz one [[ASIN:B004LOETEY Kordon/Oasis (Novalek) SOA80404 Plastic No Chew Small Animal Bell Bottle, 4-Ounce]], which is just as great as the 8 oz bottles. It came in my favorite teal color.

These bottles are flowers patterned, full in one color with a metal pipe. They are the most pretty water bottles I have seen and also high quality ones. I totally recommend them. Review Title: The best water bottle for my Rats Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: OZNaturals Tinted Moisturizer, SPF 30 Sunscreen. Broad Spectrum Protection. Zinc Oxide + Minerals In This Tinted Sunscreen Protects, Moisturizes And Blends Well To Provide A Rich, Youthful Glow! Review Date: 2015/10/12 Store: OZ Naturals Product Description: ['Skin care experts and dermatologists are in agreement on the importance of wearing sunscreen. \xa0Most premature aging of the skin is caused by sun exposure. “Photo aging,” as is it known in skin care circles, includes wrinkles, freckles, age spots, blotchy complexion, dullness, sagging skin and rough, leathery texture. \xa0In other words, just about every complaint surrounding aging skin can be traced at least in part to sun exposure, making daily sunscreen protection with an SPF 30 sunscreen a must. But not all sunscreens are created equal. \xa0OZNaturals Age Defying Solar Shield SPF 30 Broad Spectrum Tinted Sunscreen with Zinc Oxide provides broad spectrum protection from the sun’s harmful UVA/UVB rays, while moisturizing skin with a healthy-looking hint of color. Utilizing the highly stable and reflective properties of Zinc Oxide, with the natural UV diluting qualities of Octyl Methoxycinnamate, our formula offers sheer, broad-spectrum UV coverage in a luxurious tinted moisturizer formulation.'] Average Rating: 3.4 Product Details: {'Scent': 'Unscented', 'Sun Protection Factor': '30 Sun Protection Factor (SPF)', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '1.0 Ounce', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.5 x 3.5 x 1 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'I1-7LV1-6RQ9', 'UPC': '638317780652', 'Manufacturer': 'OZ Naturals, LLC'} Review Text: I am amazed with this product. A tinted moisturizing sunscreen? My skin is very fair, where I live is hot all year round, and I apply only sunscreen for a day time, because using foundation and going out on a bright sun was melting my make up and making me feel dirty. This sunscreen is amazing, my skin looks fresh and is glowing, I don`t look like I have foundation at all, yet my face is of a nice shade. I love this product, much better effect than it sounds.

I received a sample. Review Title: How awesome is this. Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: OZNaturals Facial Mask - This Moisturizing Face Mask Contains Rosehip Oil, Pro Vitamin B5 & Amino Acids - This Anti Aging Mask Deeply Hydrates Dry Skin For A Healthy Youthful Glow! Review Date: 2015/11/11 Store: Auperwel Product Description: ["POWERHOUSE FORMULATION includes Rosehip Oil Pro-Vitamin B5 Amino Acid Complex and an Herbal Blend that deeply nourishes and refreshes aging skin like no other face mask on the market;MOISTURIZING FACE MASK gives effective hydration to dry dull skin Ã‚Â\xa0Natural and active ingredients including hyaluronic acid and Vitamin E leave skin hydrated radiant and more youthful looking;USING THE HIGHEST concentration of natural and active ingredients possible Never compromising on quality and performance Our goal is to give you beautiful skin in eco-friendly ways Fragrance-free;DEEPLY HYDRATING facial mask delivers moisture directly to the skin and helps calm dry skin irritation Ã‚Â\xa0Gentle enough for use every day it will become your favorite weapon against dry skin;Satisfaction Guaranteed Unconditional 30-Day Return And Refund Policy Ensures You'll Be Delighted Or Your Money Back Developed By Renowned Aesthetician Angela Irish - For All Skin Types"] Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Auperwel', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating', 'Scent': 'Unscented', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 2 x 1 inches; 4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'GN-15Q6-JVWK', 'UPC': '616806598469', 'Manufacturer': 'Oz Naturals'} Review Text: Very nice hydration face mask by OZ Naturals, made in the USA and cruelty free. Main ingredients are Hyaluronic Acid (very effective), Vitamin B5, Vitamin E. It smells pleasant. My face does feel baby smooth and the tube is huge, it will last for a long time. I tried many products by OZ Naturals and they are all very natural and of a high quality. I do not like that I have to wash this mask off, I would personally prefer a peel-off.

I received a sample for evaluation. Review Title: OZ Naturals 72% organic. Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Fungus Nail Treatment,Sky-shop Fungus Nail Repair Oil, Fungal Nail Eliminator for Fingernails and Toenails, Repairs & Protects from Discoloration, Brittle and Cracked Nails (35ml) Review Date: 2016/05/14 Store: Pei Mei Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Pei Mei', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Item Weight': '0.25 Pounds', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '1.0582 Ounce', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 2 x 5 inches; 4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'Natural Nail Polish Remover', 'UPC': '646437736213'} Review Text: I am a big fan of Pure Body Naturals, however not of this particular product. In fact, I don't get all the positive reviews, this nail polish remover hardly works. It takes a very long time to clean my nails with this. I use a regular nail polish, that any cheap remover, even the one from a dollar store has no problem taking off, but not this natural remover by Pure Body Naturals. I followed instruction, put a drop on each of my nails, waited and tried to rub it off with a cotton ball, to no success. It took some of the polish off, but left a whole lot left behind. It is possible to remove nail polish with this, but totally not worth the time/effort.

I also haven't notice my nails feeling any better using this natural product over the regular ones, so I definitely will not be using this one, nor ever buy again, nor recommend. This may be worth, if you don't mind spending long time removing your polish and are very concerned using only natural products, other than that, its not at all. I am very disappointed, its the worth nail polish remover I ever came across, nothing beats it. Unfortunately I already opened it, so I am not going to return it nor gift it, it will probably just go straight into the trash, I don't think I will want to use it any time.

I received a sample in exchange of my honest opinion. Review Title: The slowest nail polish remover I ever saw. Rating: 2.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Webat Bath Bombs Gift Set, Spa Bomb Fizzies & Ultra Lush Essential Oil - Dry Skin Moisturize, Fit for Bubble & Spa Bath, Handmade Birthday Gift Ideal for Lady, Women, Girlfriend, Men Review Date: 2016/07/04 Store: Webat Product Description: ["Product Specification: 1. Quantity: 6* 2.5 oz 2. Set Size: 6.3 * 4.3 * 2 inch 3. Total Weight: 14.5 oz 4. Ingredients: Baking soda, citric acid, cellulose, sodium sulfate 5. Flavor: Purple-lavender, Blue-ocean, Red-rose, Pink-vanilla, Green-green Tea, Yellow-lemon ★Best Gift Set for All Individually wrapped and gift set, perfect for birthdays, Christmas gift, anniversaries, parties and wedding favours. It is a best gift set for lover, friend, lady, women, men and so on. ★Healthy Spa at Home Bath bombs features exfoliating, fine pores, anti-fatigue, bactericidal and itching functions. Fit for detoxifying minerals and moisturizers skin, it relaxs your body and relieves fatigue to get a deep sleep after the whole day's work. A enjoyable spa aromatherapy at your home. ★Note: For external use only. Keep out of eyes. If irritation occurs, stop to use immediately and consult with your doctor. ★Package included: 1* bath bombs set（6* bath bombs)"] Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Webat', 'Scent': 'Lavender, Vanilla, Rose, Lemon', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing,Relaxing,Aromatherapy,Moisturize', 'Material Feature': 'No artificial flavors', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.52 x 5.2 x 2.8 inches; 1.85 Pounds', 'UPC': '600736170253', 'Manufacturer': 'Webat'} Review Text: I am absolutely thrilled upon opening the package with these bath bombs. They smell amazing. Each ball is 2 1/4'' in diameter, they are pretty big, they weight 4.1 oz each. There are six scents: Yoga Strength, Garden of Heaven, Revive, Energy Grapefruit, Stress Relief and Vanilla Indulgence. Each is separately wrapped in a tissue. They all lay on a bed of cut paper, looks really nice. Box is also quality and additionally factory foiled at arrival. This is very suitable for gifting. Definitely a five stars product. Their smell is addictive.

Yoga Strength - Lemon, Lime, Orange and Bergamot Oils;
Garden of Heaven - Lavender, Geranium and Lima OIls;
Revive - Peppermint, Lemon, Rosemary and Eucalyptus Essential Oils;
Energy Grapefruit - Grapefruit Essential Oil;
Stress Relief - Lavender, Marjoram and Ylang Oils;
Vanilla Indulgence - Vanilla Essential Oil.

Yoga Strength is the best.

Sample received for a fair evaluation. Review Title: Im highly impressed with these great scents. Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

First, identify consistent patterns in ratings and sentiments 2. Next, observe common themes across product purposes and use cases 3. Then, note recurring quality preferences and price sensitivity patterns 4. If irritation occurs, stop to use immediately and consult with your doctor. ★Package included: 1* bath bombs set（6* bath bombs)"] Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Webat', 'Scent': 'Lavender, Vanilla, Rose, Lemon', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing,Relaxing,Aromatherapy,Moisturize', 'Material Feature': 'No artificial flavors', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.52 x 5.2 x 2.8 inches; 1.85 Pounds', 'UPC': '600736170253', 'Manufacturer': 'Webat'} Review Text: I am absolutely thrilled upon opening the package with these bath bombs. There are six scents: Yoga Strength, Garden of Heaven, Revive, Energy Grapefruit, Stress Relief and Vanilla Indulgence. Each is separately wrapped in a tissue. Sample received for a fair evaluation. Review Title: Im highly impressed with these great scents. Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- Structure your response as: SUMMARY: [Final synthesis of preferences and patterns]
raw_response:
SUMMARY:
This individual's purchase history indicates a strong preference for high-quality, well-reviewed products, often favoring brands recognized for their natural or effective formulations. Ratings reveal a tendency to appreciate functionality, with several products receiving ratings of 4.0 or higher. The user appears partial to skincare items, particularly those that combine hydration with sun protection or anti-aging benefits. They also exhibit a positive sentiment towards practical pet supplies, suggesting a consistent demand for reliable products catering to small animals.

Common themes include a focus on moisture and skincare, with multiple purchases highlighting effective hydration and sun protection. The individual values aesthetics in products, as seen in their enthusiasm for visually appealing items like the floral-patterned water bottles.

Quality preferences lean towards products with natural ingredients or cruelty-free labels, while price sensitivity is not overtly obvious; however, they express disappointment when a product falls short of expectations relative to its cost. Overall, the core preferences highlight a blend of functionality, aesthetics, and ethical considerations in both pet care and skincare products, reflecting a discerning and value-conscious shopper.

target_interaction.title: The best mobile-makeup-bag
target_interaction.text: This bag is almost exactly what I wanted. I had an almost same Caboodles makeup bag purchased from Walmart about 8 years ago and just wanted same, new one. This one is bigger than the ones Walmart sells. I wish it was the same size as my old one as the new one appears bigger, mostly on the outside, but it sort of fits the same amount of cosmetics. Regardless, this is a beautiful bag, mine came with a separator and exactly as described. I will be purchasing Caboodles` bags again. I think the quality is very good. The top of my bag is larger than it should be and makes the bag to unnecessary look big but it still zippers around just as well. I`m happy with my purchase.
target_interaction.title_meta: Caboodles Heart Throb Long Tapered Tote, Black Diamond, 1.12 Pound
description: This bag is definitely more than meets the eye. With so many interior pockets, it will hold all your must haves and more! In-fact, you'll have to go buy some more make-up to fill it up. Now that's a bag guaranteed to make your heart throb.
